-- This script was generated by the ERD tool in pgAdmin 4.
-- Please log an issue at https://github.com/pgadmin-org/pgadmin4/issues/new/choose if you find any bugs, including reproduction steps.
BEGIN;


CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.anomaly
(
    id serial NOT NULL,
    path_gambar character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    created_at timestamp without time zone NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT anomaly_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.defect
(
    id serial NOT NULL,
    path_gambar character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    class character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    conf_level character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    x0 integer NOT NULL,
    y0 integer NOT NULL,
    x1 integer NOT NULL,
    y1 integer NOT NULL,
    created_at timestamp without time zone NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT defect_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.final
(
    id serial NOT NULL,
    anomaly_id integer NOT NULL,
    defect_id integer NOT NULL,
    user_id integer NOT NULL,
    path_gambar character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    class character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    conf_level character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    x0 integer NOT NULL,
    y0 integer NOT NULL,
    x1 integer NOT NULL,
    y1 integer NOT NULL,
    created_at timestamp without time zone NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT final_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public.user_admin
(
    user_id serial NOT NULL,
    username character varying(50) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    password character varying(100) COLLATE pg_catalog."default" NOT NULL,
    created_at timestamp without time zone DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    role character varying(20) COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    CONSTRAINT users_pkey PRIMARY KEY (user_id)
);

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.final
    ADD CONSTRAINT foreign_anomaly FOREIGN KEY (anomaly_id)
    REFERENCES public.anomaly (id) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.final
    ADD CONSTRAINT foreign_defect FOREIGN KEY (defect_id)
    REFERENCES public.defect (id) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public.final
    ADD CONSTRAINT foreign_user FOREIGN KEY (user_id)
    REFERENCES public.user_admin (user_id) MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;

END;
